General.Name: Digital Transformation Opportunities Corp
General.Description: Digital Transformation Opportunities Corp. does not have significant operations. It intends to effect a merger, capital stock exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, reorganization, or related business combination with one or more businesses or entities. Digital Transformation Opportunities Corp. was incorporated in 2020 and is based in Los Angles, California. Digital Transformation Opportunities Corp. operates as a subsidiary of Digital Transformation Sponsor LLC.
